text:
February 25th* 1952
MEMORANDUM TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF NAEB
The time comes for designating someone to represent
NAEB as an aoredited observer to the United Nations,
Since I am already an accredited radio representative
I cannot very well designate myself0
Obviously the accreditation should go to someone who
might be able to attend some of the meetings as an observero
Would you be good enough to give me the benefit of your
suggestions on this by return mailo
Seymour No Siegel
President
sns/t
